author: achapman
title: Bastian Schweinsteiger: Manchester United flop wastes no time in leaving for Chicago Fire as he moves out of mansion
text:
EFL Not Wasting Time Bastian Schweinsteiger: Manchester United flop wastes no time in leaving for Chicago Fire as he moves out of mansion 
Midfielder is set to move to MLS after failing to impress Jose Mourinho at Old Trafford and was snapped hiring moving van Pictured
